content: myraløkka fingerless mitts feature a lacy leaf pattern framed with mock cables a gusseted thumb makes for a smooth fit **measurements** length 19 cm/7 5 circumference 17 cm/6 7 9 cm/3 5 from cast-on edge to first row of thumb gore 4 5 cm/1 75 from final row of thumb gore to bind-off edge the mitts will fit a women s s-m the lace pattern is very stretchy
